documentation.text: @notice Deploy contract and make deployer the owner + initial manufacturer

@notice Grant manufacturer permissions to an address
 @param _manufacturer Address to authorize as manufacturer

@notice Grant retailer permissions to an address
 @param _retailer Address to authorize as retailer
@dev Internal helper: require a non-empty string. `err` should be a short revert message.

devdoc.details: Stores product metadata and a single sale record per product. Uses simple access control maps.

createProduct(string,string,string,strin.details: Computes and stores a hash of `_productDetails` for off-chain verification

returns.retailer: Retailer address that recorded the sale
returns.wasSold: True if a sale record exists for this product

params._buyer: Buyer's address (optional, may be zero address)

returns.exists: Whether the product exists in storage

devdoc.title: ProductVerifier

authorizeManufacturer(address).notice: Grant manufacturer permissions to an address

authorizeRetailer(address).notice: Grant retailer permissions to an address

constructor.notice: Deploy contract and make deployer the owner + initial manufacturer

getSaleInfo(string).notice: Get sale information for a product (if sold)

markAsSold(string,address,string).notice: Record a sale and mark the product as Sold

quickVerify(string).notice: Quick verification for consumers: existence, status, manufacturer and batch

userdoc.notice: Simple product registration & verification for manufacturers and retailers
